item.title: [JDK-8321067] Unlock experimental options in EATests.java
item.description:
Test: com/sun/jdi/EATests.java
JDK Builds: jdk-21.0.2+9-51, jdk-21.0.3+1-24
OS: Generic
Regression: Yes, This failure is not seen in previous CI builds
Partial Error Log:
Target VM failed to initialize.
java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "com.sun.jdi.VirtualMachine.setDebugTraceMode(int)" because "this.vm" is null
at VMConnection.open(VMConnection.java:160)
at TestScaffold.connect(TestScaffold.java:711)
at TestScaffold.startUp(TestScaffold.java:403)
at TestScaffold.startTo(TestScaffold.java:413)
at TestScaffold.startToMain(TestScaffold.java:408)
at EATests.runTests(EATests.java:343)
at TestScaffold.startTests(TestScaffold.java:470)
at EATests.main(EATests.java:308)
at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invoke(DirectMethodHandleAccessor.java:103)
at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:580)
at com.sun.javatest.regtest.agent.MainActionHelper$AgentVMRunnable.run(MainActionHelper.java:333)
at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1583)
item.summary: Unlock experimental options in EATests.java

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Changeset: ba79073d
Author: Roman Kennke <rkennke@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-11-30 14:15:10 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/commit/ba79073da5baede8d381cd495fb82379b6775f09

[jdk21u-fix-request] Approval Request from Roman Kennke
The backport for [JDK-8319926](https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8319926) was missing to unlock experimental options, because the LockingMode option only became non-experimental in JDK22. This change adds -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions to EATests.java run configurations. The fix is JDK21-specific.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/pull/414
Date: 2023-11-30 08:26:48 +0000
Yep the backport of the test was bad as LockingMode is experimental in 21.

In JDK 22 JDK-8318895 modified this test to specify the LockingMode. That worked because LockingMode is not experimental in 22. However, it is experimental in JDK 21, so the backport (JDK-8319926) is what introduced this issue. I think the fix is to have the test use -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions in JDK 21.
Looks like changes in JDK-8318895 have caused this regression

The failure message is misleading. See JDK-8282712 as to why (it was fixed in 22). However, there is a real issue here. Further up the log you see:

Error: VM option 'LockingMode' is experimental and must be enabled via -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions.
Error: The unlock option must precede 'LockingMode'.
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.

This test does not enable UnlockExperimentalVMOptions. I assume there was some recent hotspot change that is causing this issue.

item.title: [JDK-8319922] libCreationTimeHelper.so fails to link in JDK 21
item.description:
Fails to build in JDK 21 because the -ldl option appears before the module that requires dlsym.

```
/usr/bin/ld: /shared/projects/openjdk/jdk-jdk21u-dev/output-fastdebug/support/test/jdk/jtreg/native/support/libCreationTimeHelper/libCreationTimeHelper.o: in function `Java_CreationTimeHelper_linuxIsCreationTimeSupported':
/shared/projects/openjdk/jdk-jdk21u-dev/source/test/jdk/java/nio/file/attribute/BasicFileAttributeView/libCreationTimeHelper.c:33: undefined reference to `dlsym'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

I have no idea why this only fails for me.

Seen on Ubuntu 20.04, g++ 10, glibc 2.31
item.summary: libCreationTimeHelper.so fails to link in JDK 21

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This is a follow-up fix for a compilation issue in test libs introduced with JDK-8316304 on some systems. Please approve. Low risk only a test lib compile change. Approval only needed if JDK-8316304 goes in as well.

URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/commit/ccc2fd0cd3fd23775c37422b9ff8127f2d10cd8a

Fix Request JDK 21u

This is a JDK 21 specific patch to fix a link error when linking Jtreg native test libraries. It does not seem to affect all environments, but it affected mine. The relevant code is JDK 21-specific, therefore no need to patch JDK 22.

The patch is low risk. GHAs went through, manual tests with the patch confirmed it worked.
This doesn't affect 22, since the head commit used JEP 454 API (which is non-preview since 22) for the test.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/pull/351
Date: 2023-11-10 13:47:19 +0000
